author: misilva73
content:
Hi all!
The agenda for the Repricings Breakout Call #2 is updated: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1785
I pinged each EIP champion. If you cannot attend, please find another author to present your EIP.
Also, if we are missing any EIP that has not yet presented, reach out to me I will add you

author: barnabasbusa
content: Hi client devs. Please aim to do a mainnet release by EOD. Thank you.

author: wolovim
content:
another reminder: EL teams are asked to have written glamsterdam scoping proposals by ACDE this thursday (CL teams by next thursday at ACDC)

brief discussion at ACDT today about the overwhelming number of EIPs to analyze; suggestions were made, e.g. disqualify those that are under-specified to reduce the list to further review. alex originally suggested that even higher level themes would be helpful to move the discussion along (https://forkcast.org/calls/acde/223/#t=1479)

if its helpful, the forkcast rank page is updated and available: https://forkcast.org/rank
